definitions.definition: A person holding the stakes of bettors, with the responsibility of delivering the pot to the winner of the bet.
A person such as a trustee , escrow agent or garnishee , who holds money or assets under trust for another party in a contractual agreement or as part of a claim .
A person or organisation with a legitimate interest (a stake ) in a given situation , action or enterprise .

main_definition: A person holding the stakes of bettors, with the responsibility of delivering the pot to the winner of the bet.
secondary_definitions: ( law ) A person such as a trustee , escrow agent or garnishee , who holds money or assets under trust for another party in a contractual agreement or as part of a claim .
( business ) A person or organisation with a legitimate interest (a stake ) in a given situation , action or enterprise .
